name: Dual Bros
description:
Dual Bros

 

Game Description: Dual Bros is a 3d top down alien shooter.

 

Gameplay: The game is an endles alien shooter, it is also stylized.

 

Abilities and mechanics: There are twin characters that shoot simultaneously and move in opposite directions.

The enemies come in waves which increase as the game progresses at a linear rate. enemies on the right are fire based,

enemies on the left are iced based, the CONTROL character on the right side is iced based to counter the

fire based enemies on the right, the Mirror character on the left is Fire based to counter the enemies on the left

 

Visuals: Characters have are unreal basic mannequins attached with emmissive materials, enemies are shapes with emmisive glow.

 

Lore: 2 cyber connected brothers of one mind are trying to defend their ships resources from alien pirates,

who wish to access their resources and destroy the armory, destroying and killing them, will they survive the horde of enemies faced against them??

 

Setting: Spaceship

Location:

Theme: Alien Invasion

 

Art Style: CyberPunk/SciFi.
